cause.description:
Every year in the US one billion plastic bags are sent to the land fills...every bag takes 1,000 years to disintegrate (Vogue June 2007).
How many plastic bags do you have kicking around?
1. Plastic bags are filling up our land fills at a rapid rate
2. Plastic bags are a potential cause for extinction
cause.mission: Minimalize the use of plastic bags
cause.name: No More Plastic Bags
